newsitem.title: ITALY: Italian bond futures steady ahead of long weekend.
newsitem.headline: Italian bond futures steady ahead of long weekend.

text.p: 1505 GMT - Italian debt market ending steady after quiet day as dealers head off for long weekend. Milan markets shut Friday, reopen Monday. Cash market finished at midession.
* Bonds:Jul07 +19bps at 101.22, yield 6.68 pct, spread vs 10-yr Bund 101 bps.
* Futures:Sep LIF +22 bps at 135.45, sup 134.96, res 135.75.
